unnormalised: Hey everyone! Air quality in many Indian cities, especially Delhi, is a serious concern. We've all seen the news during Diwali, around Oct/Nov each year, with AQI levels skyrocketing! It’s easy to feel helpless, but there *are* things we can do.
normalised: Firstly, consider your transportation. Can you carpool with colleagues like Ramesh and Priya? Using public transport, cycling, or even walking short distances instead of driving can make a difference. Think about it - even switching one car trip a week contributes! The metro construction in Kolkata, though disruptive, will hopefully alleviate some pressure on road traffic eventually.
